name: The Lab (itch) (TheJYT)
description:
- The Lab -

A shady man sneaks into the lab to destroy one of the most revolutionary experiments in the world. You, as one of the laborants rewind back in time to prevent the guy from bowing up the whole lab. Interact with NPC's and seek through the map to find a solution, good luck!

- Controls -

WASD to move, E to interact. That's all you need to know ;)

- Solutions - SPOILER ALERT

There are 2 ways:

- Go to the security room, grab the controller and interact with the remote screen. Scroll through the camera's using "A" and "D" and collect evidence by filming the shady guy for 2 seconds. Now you'll be thrown out of the CCTV's and you'll have to talk to the security guard who will arrest the shady guy.

- Talk to the Janitor, look for his broom, flashlight and screwdriver (they are all in his little room in the back of one of the labs) and go back to him. You'll now have the key to the big door. Walk to it, open it and knock out the shady guy.
